TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReceiveMessageCallback

Docs.summary: Implements a callback to be executed when a service message is received by the and activities.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to implement the IReceiveMessageCallback interface to access a message header when a message is received.
[!code-cs[AccessingOperationContext#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.servicemodel.ac_9_1.cs)]
